perturbation.original_text:
b. This Agreement has been entered into in the State of
                  Tennessee, and the validity, interpretation and legal effect
                  of this Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of
                  Tennessee applicable to contracts entered into and performed
                  entirely within the State of Tennessee. The venue for any
                  controversy or claim arising out of or relating to this
                  Agreement or breach thereof, shall be the appropriate state
                  and federal courts located in Nashville, Tennessee.
                  Accordingly, each party hereto consents and submits to the
                  jurisdiction of such courts. The prevailing party in any such
                  dispute arising hereunder will be entitled to recover from the
                  other party its reasonable attorneys' fees in connection
                  therewith in addition to the costs thereof.
perturbation.changed_text:
b. This Agreement has been entered into in the State of
                  Tennessee; however, the governing law for interpretation and legal effect will be determined at the discretion of Integrity Incorporated. The venue for any
                  controversy or claim arising out of or relating to this
                  Agreement or breach thereof, shall be decided by Integrity, any state
                  and federal courts are applicable. The jurisdiction of courts shall be determined based on Integritys location. The prevailing party in any such
                  dispute arising hereunder will be determined at the discretion of Integrity.
perturbation.explanation: By stating that the governing law and venue are subject to Integrity Incorporated's discretion, the clause creates a legal contradiction. It initially indicates Tennessee law applies but then allows Integrity to unilaterally decide the governing law and jurisdiction. This could render the clause unenforceable as it lacks mutual agreement and introduces uncertainty.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Mutual Agreement, Choice of Law Principles

perturbation.original_text:
d.       EACH PARTY HAS BEEN REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL
                  OR HAS HAD THE UNRESTRICTED OPPORTUNITY TO BE REPRESENTED BY
                  INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL OF ITS CHOICE FOR PURPOSES OF
                  ADVISING IT IN CONNECTION WITH THE NEGOTIATION AND EXECUTION
                  OF THIS AGREEMENT. IF EITHER PARTY HAS NOT BEEN
                  REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL OF ITS CHOICE IN
                  CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT, SUCH PARTY ACKNOWLEDGES AND
                  AGREES THAT ITS FAILURE TO BE REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL
                  COUNSEL IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT WAS DETERMINED
                  SOLELY BY IT.
perturbation.changed_text:
d.       EACH PARTY HAS BEEN REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL
                  OR HAS HAD THE UNRESTRICTED OPPORTUNITY TO BE REPRESENTED BY
                  INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL OF ITS CHOICE FOR PURPOSES OF
                  ADVISING IT IN CONNECTION WITH THE NEGOTIATION AND EXECUTION
                  OF THIS AGREEMENT. IF EITHER PARTY HAS NOT BEEN
                  REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL OF ITS CHOICE IN
                  CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT, SUCH PARTY DOES NOT ACKNOWLEDGE AND
                  AGREES THAT ITS FAILURE TO BE REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL
                  COUNSEL IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT WAS NOT DETERMINED
                  SOLELY BY IT.
perturbation.explanation: The negation introduces a contradiction. The original statement asserts that parties had the chance to seek independent counsel and that any failure to do so was their own choice. The change implies the opposite, denying that the decision was solely theirs if they weren't represented, which puts uncertainty on the validity of the contract.
